original_text: You accept people who make you like their slaves. You accept people who cheat you, or take things from you. You accept people who are proud of themselves. Even if someone hits you in your face, you still accept him.
korean_text: 누가 너희를 종으로 삼거나 잡아먹거나 빼앗거나 스스로 높이거나 뺨을 칠지라도 너희가 용납하는도다

sentences.original_text: You accept people who make you like their slaves.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신을 자기들의 종처럼 만드는 사람들을 받아들입니다.

sentences.original_text: You accept people who cheat you,

sentences.korean_translation: 또는 당신에게서 물건을 가져가는 사람들도 받아들입니다.

sentences.original_text: You accept people who are proud of themselves.
Even if someone hits you in your face,
